content: Morning all, all our day two zoom is at 8:30 (a little under 1 hour from now, 4:30 GMT, 5:30 CET), as shown on Confluence https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2021-01+Vulcan+-+Medication+Definition (and not as show on Whova...). If you want to report what you have been up to, please do. If you need anything, that is a good time to ask. Or ask on here any time, of course.

2021_01-Connectathon-Medication-Definition-Track-day-2.pdf
slides I am just about to go through on the zoom

FWIW, FHIR does support adding an attribute for a product image. Here's an example
http://build.fhir.org/medicationknowledge-definitions.html#MedicationKnowledge.drugCharacteristic.value_x_
